description:
Orchestral Repertoire for Harp is an orchestral repertory class designed to give orchestral playing experience to the Harp majors of YSTCM. In 13 sessions throughout the semester, the class will read and rehearse significant orchestral
repertoire for Harp. Repertoire selected in this module will build on and complement repertoire studied in MUA3186. Harp students consolidate and further develop technical, musical, and stylistic skills and knowledge essential to this repertoire’s effective execution. This module continues to develop professional audition performance techniques and skills.
title: Orchestral Repertoire for Harp 3B
